titleStmt.title: A short dialogue, wherein is proved, that no man can be saved without good vvorkes
titleStmt.author: Corderoy, Jeremy, b. 1562 or 3.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, and are to be sold in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Crowne, by Simon Waterson [in London],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
